note:
Computer science postdoc at the University of Zagreb Faculty of Organization and Informatics, Croatia. Currently (until Jun 2025) on a research visit to UPV VRAIN, Valencia, Spain.

Interested in multiagent systems, gamification, computer games, ontologies, artificial intelligence; international research and project cooperation.
